DataElement.preferredName: Pulmonary Function Test Post Bronchodilator Assessment Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The numeric value that represents the test result from Pulmonary Function Test (PFT) after the bronchodilator is administered.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Pulmonary Function Test Post Bronchodilator Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A broad range of tests that are performed to assess how well lungs inhale and exhale air and how efficiently they transfer oxygen into the blood._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Agents that cause an increase in the expansion of a bronchus or bronchial tubes._The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A broad range of tests that are performed to assess how well lungs inhale and exhale air and how efficiently they transfer oxygen into the blood.
